articles.description: The Rockets feel no pressure to trade James Harden or Russell Westbrook and are willing to head into the season with both stars on the team, sources told ESPN.
articles.content: The Houston Rockets feel no pressure to trade James Harden or Russell Westbrook, regardless of the superstars' strong desire for fresh starts with different franchises, and are "willing to get uncomf… [+2986 chars]

articles.title: ‘We’ve only just begun’: Lewis Hamilton set to end painful wait over $217m F1 future - Fox Sports
articles.description: With just weeks left on his Mercedes contract, Lewis Hamilton is ready to sit down with team boss Toto Wolff to settle on a new mega money deal extending his involvement in Formula One.
articles.content: Hamilton is one of the last drivers on the grid to not have his 2021 F1 plans set in stone having held out on negotiating while chasing his seventh world championship, which was sewn up in Turkey on … [+2460 chars]
